sentences.en: Acting in concert limits the political fallout that comes from rescuing countries.
sentences.cn: 协调一致的行动限制了救援国施加的政治影响.

sentences.en: But the political fallout is much harder to fix.
sentences.cn: 但政治后果却难以修复.

sentences.en: Grundy lost his job in the fallout from the incident.
sentences.cn: 格伦迪受该事件影响丢了工作。

sentences.en: Human form returned to barbarism after the nuclear fallout of Atlantis.
sentences.cn: 人类在亚特兰蒂斯的核辐射后又一次回归荒蛮.

sentences.en: Producing a very great amount of long - lived radioactive fallout.
sentences.cn: 产生大量辐射微尘的产生大量的 长期 放射性下降物的.

sentences.en: Producing relatively little radioactive fallout or contamination.
sentences.cn: 相对来说几乎不产生放射尘和污染源的.

sentences.en: Take steps to minimize the fallout if you do suffer a penetration.
sentences.cn: 如果你存在入侵的风险一定要采取措施来减少损失.

sentences.en: The composition of the fallout can also be changed by'salting " the weapon to be detonated.
sentences.cn: 如果在起爆武器中另 “ 加了料 ”,那么沉降物的成分也就会有所改变.

sentences.en: The corn shucks kept it safe from the fallout.
The fallout a tad worse than Gulf War Syndrome.
sentences.cn: 引起的疾病比波斯湾战争的后遗症还严重.

sentences.en: The fallout has delayed plans for at least one technology listing.
sentences.cn: 昨日跌市已导致起码一家科技公司决定延迟上市.

sentences.en: The political fallout of the affair cost him his job.
sentences.cn: 这一事件的政治影响使他丢了工作。

sentences.en: There was a lot of fallout after the police bribes were made public.
sentences.cn: 警察受贿案公开之后,引起极大的余波.

sentences.en: They were exposed to radioactive fallout during nuclear weapons tests.
sentences.cn: 在核武器试验中他们暴露在放射性尘埃之下。

sentences.en: Third, policymakers should act together to cushion the economic fallout.
sentences.cn: 第三, 决策者应该结合举措赞助经济软着陆.

sentences.en: We should stop talking about the menace of fallout.
sentences.cn: 我们不应再谈论关于放射性微尘的危害.

trans.tran_cn: 放射尘，（核爆炸后的）沉降物，附带后果，余波
trans.tran_en: the results of a particular event, especially when they are unexpected
